body.name: Restaurant First Aid Kit - ANSI & OSHA 2021 Compliant, Wall Mount First Aid Cabinet, Commercial Large First Aid Kit for Businesses, Metal First Aid Box, Ideal for Kitchen & Restaurant Supplies
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 3 hrs 8 mins.
features: OSHA COMPLIANT FIRST AID KIT: The MFASCO First Aid Kit is compliant with the latest ANSI & OSHA 2021 standards, providing comprehensive emergency care in food service environments. This workplace medical kit surpasses the requirements of ANSI Class B Type I, II & III First Aid Kit, making it an ideal first aid kit for business.

PURPOSE-BUILT FOR RESTAURANTS: Designed specifically for food service and kitchen use, this kit contains high-quality first aid items safe for food prep areas. From detectable fabric bandages to burn dressing, this kitchen first aid kit caters to all your restaurant's safety needs.

PREMIUM METAL FIRST AID BOX: Housed in a white metal cabinet, this professional first aid kit is easy to clean and maintain. Its robust construction ensures it stands up to the rigorous conditions of a busy restaurant, enhancing its longevity.

WELL-ORGANIZED AND ACCESSIBLE: The metal cabinet is designed for convenience with three spacious shelves, and a door pouch for smaller, frequently used items. This makes it an ideal first aid kit large enough to cater to the needs of 20-50 employees, ensuring essential supplies are always within reach.

COMPREHENSIVE CARE ITEMS: Beyond first aid essentials, this emergency medicine kit includes unique items like blue finger cots and a variety of burn care supplies. Additionally, it features a comprehensive first aid guide to assist users in providing effective and appropriate emergency response.
body.description: Serve Safety First: Elevate Your Restaurant's Protection with MFASCO's ANSI & OSHA 2021 Compliant First Aid Kit! Sizzle with Confidence in the Kitchen - A Premium Metal Cabinet Packed with Purpose-Built Safety Essentials! Designed exclusively for the food service hustle, this kit is your culinary safety net. From detectable fabric bandages to burn dressing, every item is food-safe and ready to tackle any kitchen emergency. The white metal cabinet not only adds a sleek touch to your kitchen but also withstands the chaos of a bustling restaurant, promising durability without sacrificing style. Safety Made Easy: The MFASCO OSHA-Compliant First Aid Kit keeps you secure without the stress. Quick Access, Always Ready: With easy access and automatic restocking, safety is at your fingertips. Your Safety, Our Priority: Stay protected effortlessly with MFASCO's reliable First Aid Kit.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: 60 Years of Safety Excellence: MFASCO Health & Safety We are a Michigan-based small business providing first aid and safety solutions for over 60 years. From manufacturers to schools, we’re your shield in emergencies. Trust us for top-tier supplies, and a promise: Safety made simple - Introducing MFASCO, your trusted source for first aid supplies. It does have a refill system, using a QR code which takes them to a fast and easy refill checklist to help them maintain their kit. From detectable fabric bandages to burn dressing, every item is food-safe and ready to tackle any kitchen emergency. The white metal cabinet not only adds a sleek touch to your kitchen but also withstands the chaos of a bustling restaurant, promising durability without sacrificing style. Easy Accessibility: Instant Aid at Your Fingertips! Our kit ensures quick access to essential supplies for prompt and effective first aid responses. Versatile Solution: Adaptability in Every Crisis! From minor mishaps to unexpected emergencies, our kit offers a versatile solution, addressing a range of scenarios with confidence. Clear Instruction Guide: Empowering Confidence: Navigate emergencies with ease using our clear instruction guide, providing step-by-step assistance for effective first aid responses. Portable Construction: Safety on the Move! Crafted for mobility, our kit's portable construction ensures you're prepared for emergencies anywhere, anytime.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 8, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for Food Industry Employees
reviews.reviewText: This kit is perfect for anyone who works in the food industry. You get a lot of products in the kit for a great price!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 8, 2021
reviews.reviewText: This kit has almost everything you need for a class A. The only thing I am missing is finger cots.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 10, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Everything in one box
reviews.reviewText: Has everything that we need for the restaurant, but I hope we dont need

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 30, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quality, price, value all rolled into one well-equipped first aid kit
reviews.reviewText: This kid was a great replacement to the old box that I had. Comes very well-stocked for a restaurant. Would highly Recommend to anyone going to update or even just have a cleaner less messed up box. And the price to value is great

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 21, 2017
reviews.reviewText: People are Human and make mistakes. When they make mistakes, they typically injure themselves and need some first aid.This kit keeps everything readily at hand for those issues... Easy to mount on the wall.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 5, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect first aid kit

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 1, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Everything I needed to pass inspection
reviews.reviewText: Everything was right, no damage, quick shipping.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 13, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Missing some things
reviews.reviewText: Did not include everything pictured, not a huge deal, but if I wanted to run around town gathering everything, I'd had saved a few bucks in the long run, bought for the convenience and was let down.
